parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Conversations

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Check if given item was said by person to someone. See [[Conversations]] for more details.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> person [[kbWasSaid]] [receiver, topic, sentenceID, maxAge]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> person: [[Object]] - who said the item

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [receiver, topic, sentenceID, maxAge]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> receiver: [[Object]] - receiver of the sentence

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> topic: [[String]] - name of the topic used in [[kbAddTopic]]

</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> sentenceID: [[String]] - id of sentence that we want to check

</value></part><part><name>p6</name>=<value> maxAge: [[Number]] - time in seconds. [[kbWasSaid]] will check whether the sentence was said in last '''max. age''' seconds

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[kbWasSaid]] [otherUnit, "myTopic", "mySentenceID", 3];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Conversations]], [[kbAddTopic]], [[kbHasTopic]], [[kbTell]], [[kbReact]], [[kbRemoveTopic]], [[kbAddDatabase]], [[kbAddDatabaseTargets]], [[FSM]], [[FSM Editor]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
